definitions.definition: Any structure built above the top full deck (FM 55-501).
Any material structure or edifice built on something else; that which is raised on a foundation or basis.
All that part of a building above the basement .
The sleepers and fastenings , in distinction from the roadbed .
The social sphere of ideology which includes religion , art , politics , law and all traditional values.

main_definition: ( nautical ) Any structure built above the top full deck (FM 55-501).
secondary_definitions: Any material structure or edifice built on something else; that which is raised on a foundation or basis.
( sometimes figurative ) All that part of a building above the basement .
( British , railroad ) The sleepers and fastenings , in distinction from the roadbed .
( Marxism ) The social sphere of ideology which includes religion , art , politics , law and all traditional values.
